Author: hastrup#8742
Content: I'm a little confused. The buy back fund that gives 0,50 usd back. So if I give 1 btc for x amount of pgt and the price on btc goes to the roof . Can I buy back my btc for the same price?

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: let me try to explain. Revenue from our products goes to FUND. Right?

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: Yes

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: this FUNDS can only be used to Buyback Pungo tokens

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: Yes

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: so you can sell PGT on any exchange that supports them...or come to us and we will buy them back with the funds accumulated in the FUND.

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content:
So for example, if we accumulate crypto in the FUND, and the value of this crypto is 10 million USD

it means that we can buy back to any one who requests to do so, at 1 USD/PGT

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content:
So for example, if we accumulate crypto in the FUND, and the value of this crypto is 10 million USD

it means that we can buy back to any one who requests to do so, at 1 USD/PGT, as there are 10 million PGT (imagine all are distributed)

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: however the idea is that this FUND is here so every token holders can be sure that there is something backing TOKEN VALUE

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: if our business goes good, FUND keeps increasing as the time passes

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: which is something I find totally logic...btw

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: if you see the "revenue fee" is similar to the one most exchanges apply, 0.2% per operation

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: Ok I see. Is the fund open to see? How much it hold?

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: it means everyone trading on our platform...we take that small piece and send to the FUND

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: yes, the FUND data will be published by https://openingchain.org

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: a FOUNDATION from barcelona

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: Ok thx :)

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: they will publish the FUNDS stored, where those funds come from, how many PGT we (as a company) hold, how do we give a way the PGT we control...

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: so basically they will publish everything related to how we handle things. You can take a look at our paper at https://pungotoken.com

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: So it could be 2usd/pgt. whatever the fund hold devided by coin supply?

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: rigth

Author: hastrup#8742
Content: Thx :)

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: if we accumulate 20 million, its 2 usd/pgt

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: however I would say that market will probably trade over "real price"

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: depending on expectations

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: if FUND holds 1usd/pgt but we are doing great...market would expect value to grow fast so probably it will be better for any holder to sell in the open market...

Author: kimmel (Pungo.io)#2275
Content: well, if it happens with coins backed by...nothing...I guess that a coin backed by a real value behind should perform much better
